properties.name: Alhambra
properties.description: Stunning Moorish palace with intricate tilework and Sierra Nevada backdrop

properties.name: Ronda & Puente Nuevo
properties.description: Dramatic town perched above 100m deep El Tajo Gorge with iconic bridge

properties.name: El Caminito del Rey
properties.description: Thrilling walkway pinned to cliff faces 100m above Gaitanes Gorge

properties.name: Park Guell
properties.description: Gaudi's colorful mosaic park with panoramic city views

properties.name: San Nicolas Viewpoint
properties.description: Best viewpoint of the Alhambra against Sierra Nevada mountains

properties.name: Punta de Tarifa
properties.description: Southernmost point of mainland Europe where Atlantic meets Mediterranean

properties.name: Sagrada Familia
properties.description: Gaudi's unfinished masterpiece, now world's tallest church at 172m (UNESCO)

properties.name: Plaza de Espana (Seville)
properties.description: Spectacular 1929 semicircular plaza with tiled alcoves representing Spanish provinces
